alert.note: Alert for Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:45AM CDT until June 29 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Coles County in east central Illinois... Southern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Clark County in east central Illinois... Northeastern Cumberland County in east central Illinois... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 445 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Casey, or 11 miles northeast of Toledo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Westfield around 450 AM CDT. Martinsville around 500 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Clarksville and Marshall. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 118 and 119, and between mile markers 121 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
